description.S2: He wants a special cache of anthrocillin,
description.S3: found in the Emerald Vale Community Center.
description.S4: Esther confronted you outside of Abernathy's house,
description.S5: and suggested that you should give the medicine to her instead of Abernathy.

blurb.B1: You can find the Experimental Anthrocillin in the Emerald Vale Community Center inside the medical area.
blurb.B2: You'll need the Medical Bay key to get in there,
blurb.B3: which can be found on one of the Marauders.
blurb.B4: Once you obtain it you can give it to Esther or Martin.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I have that medicine you wanted.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: Let's see it. Don't keep us waiting.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Esther tells me you have a tendency toward hypochondria.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I haven't decided what I'm doing with it yet.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sweet, life-giving nostrum. The first hit is always the best.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: Scratched together all the bits I had around the domicile. It ain't as much as you deserve, but it's all I got.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I risked my life to save yours, Abernathy.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not true. You've got a secret. Secrets aren't free.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: You are wringing the blood out of me. Here. You can have whatever is in my pockets.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: You'd really sprat me out? For what - a couple extra bits? Here. Take it then.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: I don't know what that means. Is that some sort of medical condition? Is my plague getting worse or something?

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: Haven't decided? I hired you! The nature of your employment requires you to deliver in my hand some genuine anthrocillin!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You obviously need this. <Give Abernathy the medicine.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: This medicine belongs to the authorities.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Anthrocillin's worth a lot to the right buyer.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: Are you out of your mind? You're just gonna hand that over to Reyes? You know she's just gonna give that medicine to someone younger and stronger and prettier.

dialog.speaker: MartinAbernathy (Male)
dialog.utterance: You're right, it is. Can't blame a mercenary for trying to make a profit.
